files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.ByteArrayMemoryAdapter
files.Summary: Represents an adapter for reading and writing a value from and to memory. This implementation reads and writes a byte array from and to memory using an address resolver and a size.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.FreezeFailureEventArgs
files.Summary: Event arguments used when a freeze operation fails.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.GenericMemoryAdapter<TValue>
files.Summary: Represents an adapter for reading and writing a value from and to memory. This implementation reads and writes any value type from and to memory using an address resolver.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.IMemoryAdapter<TValue>
files.Summary: Represents an adapter for reading and writing a value from and to memory.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.StringPointerMemoryAdapter
files.Summary: Represents an adapter for reading and writing a value from and to memory. This implementation reads and writes a string from and to memory using an address resolver and the string settings.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.ThreadValueFreezer<TValue>
files.Summary: Provides methods to freeze a value in memory, using a thread that constantly writes the value.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.TimerValueFreezer<TValue>
files.Summary: Provides methods to freeze a value in memory, using a timer to write the value at regular intervals.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.ValueAnchor<TValue>
files.Summary: Provides methods to manipulate and track a specific value in memory.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.ValueChangedEventArgs<TValue>
files.Summary: Event arguments used when a value observed by a changes.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.ValueLostEventArgs<TValue>
files.Summary: Event arguments used when a value observed by a becomes unreadable (causes a read failure). This may happen when the target process frees or rearranges its memory, or when the related instance is detached.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.ValueReacquiredEventArgs<TValue>
files.Summary: Event arguments used when a value observed by a is successfully read after being lost.

files.Title: MindControl.Anchors.ValueWatcher<TValue>
files.Summary: Uses a timer to periodically read a value from a given anchor and raise events when the value changes.

files.Title: MindControl.AssemblerExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods around code assembling.

files.Title: MindControl.ByteSearchPattern
files.Summary: Represents a pattern of bytes to search for in memory.

files.Title: MindControl.Code.CodeChange
files.Summary: Represents a modification to a code section in the memory of a process. Allows reverting the alteration by writing the original bytes back to the code section.

files.Title: MindControl.Code.ProcessMemoryCodeExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for related to executable memory.

files.Title: MindControl.FindBytesSettings
files.Summary: Settings for the FindBytes method.

files.Title: MindControl.Hooks.CodeHook
files.Summary: Represents a modification to a code section in the memory of a process. The modification is a hook, which replaces code instructions with a jump to a block of injected code. Allows reverting the jump by writing the original instructions back to the code section. Reverting does not remove the injected code, but will remove the entry point to the code.

files.Title: MindControl.Hooks.HookExecutionMode
files.Summary: Defines how the injected code is executed in relation to the original code.

files.Title: MindControl.Hooks.HookJumpMode
files.Summary: Defines how the hook jump should be performed.

files.Title: MindControl.Hooks.HookOptions
files.Summary: Holds settings for a hook operation.

files.Title: MindControl.Hooks.HookRegister
files.Summary: Registers or register groups that can be saved and restored in hooks.

files.Title: MindControl.Hooks.HookRegisters
files.Summary: Provides preset collections of registers for hooks.

files.Title: MindControl.Hooks.ProcessMemoryHookExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for related to code hooks.

files.Title: MindControl.IAddressResolver
files.Summary: Provides a way to resolve an address in the target process.

files.Title: MindControl.LiteralAddressResolver
files.Summary: Provides a way to resolve an address in the target process. This implementation takes a literal address and always resolves to that same address.

files.Title: MindControl.MemoryAllocation
files.Summary: Represents a range of memory that has been allocated in a process. Can be used to safely manage data or code storage using reservations.

files.Title: MindControl.MemoryProtectionStrategy
files.Summary: Enumerates potential strategies to deal with memory protection.

files.Title: MindControl.MemoryRange
files.Summary: Represents a range of memory addresses in a process.

files.Title: MindControl.MemoryReservation
files.Summary: Represents a reservation of a range of memory within a . Reservations within an allocation cannot overlap and thus can be used to safely manage data or code storage over a process. Disposing a reservation will free the memory range for other uses.

files.Title: MindControl.Modules.RemoteModule
files.Summary: Represents a module loaded into another process.

files.Title: MindControl.Native.IOperatingSystemService
files.Summary: Provides process-related features.

files.Title: MindControl.Native.MemoryAllocationType
files.Summary: Allocation types for memory allocation functions.

files.Title: MindControl.Native.MemoryFreeType
files.Summary: Allocation types for memory freeing functions.

files.Title: MindControl.Native.MemoryProtection
files.Summary: Protection attributes attributed to a memory page.

files.Title: MindControl.Native.MemoryRangeMetadata
files.Summary: Contains properties about a uniform range in the virtual address space of a process.

files.Title: MindControl.Native.Win32Service
files.Summary: Contains DllImports for Windows functions required internally by other components.

files.Title: MindControl.PointerExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for pointers.

files.Title: MindControl.PointerOffset
files.Summary: Describes a pointer offset as part of a . Effectively, this is a number ranging from -0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF to 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF.

files.Title: MindControl.PointerPath
files.Summary: Holds a string expression consisting in a base address followed by a sequence of pointer offsets. Allows programs to consistently retrieve data in the process memory by following pointers to reach a dynamic address. A pointer path instance can be reused to optimize performance, as it is only parsed once, when constructed.

files.Title: MindControl.PointerPathResolver
files.Summary: Provides a way to resolve an address in the target process. This implementation takes a pointer path and resolves it to an address in the target process.

files.Title: MindControl.ProcessMemory
files.Summary: Provides methods to manipulate the memory of a process.

files.Title: MindControl.ProcessMemoryStream
files.Summary: A stream that reads or writes into the memory of a process.

files.Title: MindControl.ProcessTracker
files.Summary: Provides a for a process identified by its name. The tracker is able to re-attach to a process with the same name after it has been closed and reopened.

files.Title: MindControl.RangeAlignmentMode
files.Summary: Defines a byte alignment mode for memory ranges.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.BaseModuleNotFoundFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a path evaluation operation when the base module specified in the pointer path was not found.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.CodeAssemblyFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure that occurred in a hook operation when instructions could not be assembled into a code block.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.CodeDecodingFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure that occurred while writing code to a target process when a disassembling operation failed.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.ConversionFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory read operation when trying to convert the bytes read from memory to the target type.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.ConversionWriteFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory write operation when trying to convert the value to write to an array of bytes to write in memory.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.DetachedProcessFailure
files.Summary: Failure that occurs when the process is not attached.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.DisposableResult<TResult>
files.Summary: Represents the result of an operation that can either succeed or fail, with a result value in case of success. This variant is disposable and may hold a disposable result. When a successful instance is disposed, the result will be too.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.DisposedAllocationFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory reservation operation when the target allocation has been disposed.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.DisposedThreadFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a thread operation when the thread handle has already been disposed.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.Failure
files.Summary: Base class for failures. Can also be used directly when no specific failure type is needed.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.FunctionNotFoundFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a thread operation when the target function cannot be found.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.HookCodeAssemblySource
files.Summary: Enumerates potential blocks for a .

files.Title: MindControl.Results.IncompatibleBitnessPointerFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory read operation when the target process is 32-bit, but the target memory address is not within the 32-bit address space.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.IncompatibleBitnessProcessFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a process attach operation when the target process is 64-bit and the current process is 32-bit.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.IncompatibleBitnessWriteFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory write operation when the target process is 32-bit, but the target memory address is not within the 32-bit address space.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.IncompatiblePointerPathBitnessFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a path evaluation operation when the target process is 32-bit, but the target memory address is not within the 32-bit address space.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.InsufficientSpaceFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory reservation operation when no space is available within the allocated memory range to reserve the specified size.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.InvalidArgumentFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in an operating system operation when the provided arguments are invalid.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.InvalidBytePatternFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure occurring when the provided byte search pattern is invalid.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.InvalidStringSettingsFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a string read operation when the settings provided are invalid.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.LibraryFileNotFoundFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a library injection operation when the library file to inject was not found.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.LibraryLoadFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a library injection operation when the library function call fails.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.LimitRangeOutOfBoundsFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory allocation operation when the provided limit range is not within the bounds of the target process applicative memory range.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.MemoryProtectionRemovalFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory write operation when the system API call to remove the protection properties of the target memory space fails.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.MemoryProtectionRestorationFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory write operation when the system API call to restore the protection properties of the target memory space after writing fails.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.ModuleAlreadyLoadedFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a library injection operation when the module to inject is already loaded in the target process.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.MultipleTargetProcessesFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a process attach operation when multiple processes with the given name were found.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.NoFreeMemoryFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory allocation operation when no free memory large enough to accomodate the specified size was found in the target process within the searched range.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.NotSupportedFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure when an operation is not supported.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.OperatingSystemCallFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a system API call.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.PointerOutOfRangeFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a path evaluation operation when a pointer in the path is out of the target process address space.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.Result<TResult>
files.Summary: Represents the result of an operation that can either succeed or fail, with a result value in case of success.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.Result
files.Summary: Represents the result of an operation that can either succeed or fail.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.ResultFailureException
files.Summary: Exception that may be thrown by failed .

files.Title: MindControl.Results.StringTooLongFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a string read operation when the string length prefix was evaluated to a value exceeding the configured max length, or a null terminator was not found within the configured max length.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.TargetProcessNotFoundFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a process attach operation when the target process could not be found.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.TargetProcessNotRunningFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a process attach operation when the target process is not running.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.ThreadWaitAbandonedFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a thread operation when a waiting operation was abandoned.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.ThreadWaitTimeoutFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a thread operation when the thread did not finish execution within the specified timeout.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.UndeterminedStringSettingsFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a string settings search operation when no adequate settings were found to read the given string from the specified pointer.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.UnsupportedTypeReadFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory read operation when the type to read is not supported.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.UnsupportedTypeWriteFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure in a memory write operation when the value to write cannot be converted to an array of bytes.

files.Title: MindControl.Results.ZeroPointerFailure
files.Summary: Represents a failure when a null pointer is accessed.

files.Title: MindControl.State.ExceptionEventArgs
files.Summary: Event arguments for an exception.

files.Title: MindControl.State.IStateTimer
files.Summary: Provides a common interface for timers that can tick on their own but also be forced to tick manually.

files.Title: MindControl.State.PrecisionTimer
files.Summary: High precision non-overlapping timer.

files.Title: MindControl.State.StateEventArgs<T>
files.Summary: Event arguments for events related to arbitrary process states.

files.Title: MindControl.State.StateWatcher<T>
files.Summary: An abstract watcher that provides a periodically refreshed state. Inherit this class to track the state of your target process in real time.

files.Title: MindControl.State.ThreadingTimer
files.Summary: Timer based on .

files.Title: MindControl.StringLengthPrefix
files.Summary: Defines settings about the prefix that holds the length of a string.

files.Title: MindControl.StringLengthUnit
files.Summary: Defines what is counted by a string length prefix.

files.Title: MindControl.StringSettings
files.Summary: Defines how strings are read and written in a process' memory.

files.Title: MindControl.Threading.RemoteThread
files.Summary: Represents an awaitable thread running an operation in another process.
